languages.text: Получив болезненный урок на Футфоле, Инцендия Чорда усмирила свое фанатичное рвение и, оставив дела правления, удалилась на монастырский мир. Эпоха чисток подошла к концу, а с ней — и эпоха закона. Почуяв слабость власти, подняло голову темное наследие нечестивой Аспис, и понемногу владения Инцендии начали превращаться в логово преступников и пиратов.

Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.
languages.original_text: Получив болезненный урок на Футфоле, Инцендия Чорда усмирила свое фанатичное рвение и, оставив дела правления, удалилась на монастырский мир. Эпоха чисток подошла к концу, а с ней — и эпоха закона. Почуяв слабость власти, подняло голову темное наследие нечестивой Аспис, и понемногу владения Инцендии начали превращаться в логово преступников и пиратов.

traits.locale_text: Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda turned her fanatical zeal down. Abandoning the governance, she secluded herself in a Cloister World. The time of purges has passed — and with it, the time of law. Sensing the weakness of authority, the dark legacy of abominable Aspys rose its head, turning the Incendia's domain into the nest of criminals and pirates.

Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda turned her fanatical zeal down. Abandoning the governance, she secluded herself in a Cloister World. The time of purges has passed — and with it, the time of law. Sensing the weakness of authority, the dark legacy of abominable Aspys rose its head, turning the Incendia's domain into the nest of criminals and pirates.

Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Abandoning governance, she secluded herself in a Cloister World. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the void of authority, the dark legacy of abominable Aspyce rose its ugly head, turning Incendia's domain into a nest of criminals and pirates.

Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Abandoning governance, she secluded herself in a Cloister World. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the void of authority, the dark legacy of abominable Aspyce rose its ugly head, turning Incendia's domain into a nest of criminals and pirates.

Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.

Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.

languages.text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达在落脚港吸取了惨痛的教训，收敛了她的狂热做派。她放弃了权力，隐居在修道院世界中。她的净化之旅结束了，但法律与秩序的时代也随之结束了。由于库尔达家族群龙无首，阿斯拜丝留下的黑暗遗产显露出了它丑恶的尖牙与利爪，因森蒂娅的领土渐渐变成了罪犯与海盗的巢穴。
languages.original_text: Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.

traits.locale_text: 因森蒂娅·库尔达在落脚港吸取了惨痛的教训，收敛了她的狂热。她放弃了统治，隐居在修道院世界中。她的净化之旅结束了，然而法律与秩序的时代也随之结束了。由于库尔达家族群龙无首，阿斯拜丝留下的黑暗遗产显露出了它丑恶的尖牙与利爪，将因森蒂娅的领土变成了罪犯与海盗的巢穴。

languages.text: Nachdem sie auf Footfall eine bittere Lektion gelernt hatte, gab Incendia Chorda ihren fanatischen Eifer auf. Sie gab die Zügel der Macht ab und zog sich auf eine abgelegene Klosterwelt zurück. Die Zeit der Säuberungen verging — und damit auch die Zeit von Recht und Ordnung. In dem dadurch entstandenen Machtvakuum zeigte das dunkle Vermächtnis der abscheulichen Aspyce seine hässliche Fratze, und Incendias Reich verkam nach und nach zu einem Nest von Verbrechern und Piraten.
languages.original_text: Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem sie auf Footfall eine bittere Lektion gelernt hatte, gab Incendia Chorda ihren fanatischen Eifer auf. Sie beschloss, nie wieder führen zu wollen, und zog sich auf eine abgelegene Klosterwelt zurück. Die Zeit der Säuberungen verging — und damit auch die Zeit von Recht und Ordnung. In dem Machtvakuum zeigte das dunkle Vermächtnis der abscheulichen Aspyce seine hässliche Fratze und verwandelte Incendias Reich in ein Nest von Verbrechern und Piraten.

languages.text: Ayant bien retenu la leçon reçue à Castel, Incendia Chorda renonça à son zèle fanatique. Elle abandonna les rênes du pouvoir et s'installa dans un monde-cloître. L'ère des purges prit fin, tout comme l'ère de la loi et de l'ordre. En l'absence de toute autorité, le terrible héritage d'Aspyce refit violemment surface, transformant petit à petit le domaine d'Incendia en un nid de criminels et de pirates.
languages.original_text: Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.

traits.locale_text: Ayant bien retenu la leçon reçue à Castel, Incendia Chorda renonça à son zèle fanatique. Elle abdiqua et s'installa dans un monde-cloître. L'ère des purges prit fin, tout comme l'ère de la loi et de l’ordre. En l'absence de toute autorité, le terrible héritage d'Aspyce refit surface, transformant le domaine d'Incendia en un nid de criminels et de pirates.

languages.text: Con una lección amarga aprendida en Paso, Incendia Chorda abandonó su devoción fanática. Abandonó el poder y se recluyó en un mundo claustro. La era de la purga pasó, y, con ella, la era de la ley y el orden. Ante su ausencia, el legado negro de la abominable Aspyce se alzó una vez más, convirtiendo gradualmente el dominio de Incendia en un nido de criminales y piratas.
languages.original_text: Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.

traits.locale_text: Con una lección amarga aprendida en Paso, Incendia Chorda abandonó su devoción fanática. Dejó a un lado sus obligaciones de gobierno y se recluyó en un mundo claustro. La era de la purga pasó, y, con ella, la era de la ley y el orden. Ante la ausencia de autoridad, el legado negro de la abominable Aspyce se alzó una vez más, convirtiendo el dominio de Incendia en un nido de criminales y piratas.

languages.text: フットフォールで苦い教訓を得たインセンディア・チョーダは、狂信的な情熱を手放した。権力の座を手放した彼女は、修道惑星に隠遁した。粛清の時が過ぎ去り、法と秩序の時代も彼方に消えた。権力の座が空白となったことで、忌まわしきアスパイスの暗き遺産がその頭角を現し、インセンディアの領域を次第に犯罪と海賊の巣窟に変えてしまった。
languages.original_text: Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.

traits.locale_text: フットフォールで苦い教訓を得たインセンディア・チョーダは、狂信的な情熱を手放した。権力の座を手放した彼女は、修道惑星に隠遁した。粛清の時が過ぎ去り、法と秩序の時代も彼方に消えた。権力の座が空白となったことで、忌まわしきアスパイスの暗き遺産がその頭角を現し、インセンディアの領域を次第に犯罪と海賊の巣窟に変えてしまった。

languages.text: Binliman'da acı bir ders alan İncendia Chorda, fanatiklik seviyesindeki coşkunluğunu bir kenara attı. Elinde tuttuğu gücü bırakarak bir manastır dünyada inzivaya çekildi. Arındırma çağı ile birlikte kanun ve nizam dönemi de geride kaldı. Takip eden zamanlardaki iktidar boşluğunda, menfur Aspyce'nin karanlık mirasının çirkin sureti kendini gösterdi ve İncendia'nın diyarı, yavaş yavaş bir suçlu ve korsan yuvasına dönüştü.
languages.original_text: Having learned a bitter lesson on Footfall, Incendia Chorda let go of her fanatical zeal. Relinquishing the reins of power, she secluded herself on a cloister world. The time of purges passed — and with it, the time of law and order. In the power vacuum that followed, the dark legacy of the abominable Aspyce reared its ugly head, and Incendia's dominion gradually devolved into a nest of criminals and pirates.

traits.locale_text: Binliman'da acı bir ders alan İncendia Chorda, fanatiklik seviyesindeki coşkunluğunu bir kenara attı. Elinde tuttuğu gücü bırakarak bir manastır dünyada inzivaya çekildi. Arındırma çağı ve onunla beraber kanun ve düzenin çağı geride kaldı. Takip eden dönemdeki iktidar boşluğunda menfur Aspyce'nin karanlık mirasının çirkin sureti kendini gösterdi ve İncendia'nın diyarı yavaş yavaş bir suçlu ve korsan yuvası hâline geldi.
